custom-sql.sql: SELECT pa.* FROM ptp_p2pactivity pa INNER JOIN users_teams ut ON ut.userId = pa.userId AND ut.teamId IN [$TEAMS$] WHERE pa.actId = ? AND pa.p2pActivityId <> ? ORDER BY pa.countCorrections ASC;
SELECT pa.* FROM ptp_p2pactivity pa WHERE pa.actId = ? AND pa.p2pActivityId <> ? ORDER BY pa.countCorrections ASC;

SELECT pa.* FROM ptp_p2pactivity pa INNER JOIN users_groups ug ON ug.userId = pa.userId AND ug.groupId = ? AND ug.userId NOT IN (SELECT ut.userId FROM users_teams ut INNER JOIN team t ON t.teamId = ut.teamId AND t.groupId = ?) WHERE pa.actId = ? AND pa.p2pActivityId <> ? ORDER BY pa.countCorrections ASC;
